price: 64. Iš tiesų, Allahas prakeikė netikinčiuosius ir paruošė jiems liepsnojančią Ugnį (Pragarą).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha laʿana al-kāfirīna wa-aʿadda lahum saʿīran
